front.title: Creation and Use of Email Feedback Reports: An Applicability Statement for the Abuse Reporting Format (ARF)

abstract.t: RFC 5965 defines an extensible, machine-readable format intended for mail operators to report feedback about received email to other parties. This document describes common methods for utilizing this format for abuse reporting. Mailbox Providers of any size, mail sending entities, and end users can use these methods as a basis to create procedures that best suit them.
